title: 重载插件的问题
author: cht655425
txt_content: 怎么在服务器游戏里输入指令重载全部插件呢

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
yum
http://bbs.yumc.pw/resources/yum.5/
下载：
http://www.yumc.pw/Home/Index/Download.html#changes
输入
/yum re all
即可

或者直接/rl

replies.author: cht655425
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-11-6 13:03
下载：
http://www.yumc.pw/Home/Index/Download.html#changes
输入
谢谢
